overview: An up-and-coming rapper/producer duo, X-Kwizit (Zack Wolf) and Ill Beatz (Tom Hughes), have their first live performance in 3 days. However, the artists have secrets to keep from one another: X-Kwizit is having an affair with Ill Beatz's ex-girlfriend, and Ill Beatz accidentally ran over X-Kwizit's beloved dog. If they can't keep these secrets under wraps, their career-- and friendship-- will be put in jeopardy.
tagline: This generation's Lennon and McCartney... are not these guys.
title: OffBeat
